levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] At 2+ Reson., Order the ally on this units immediate right(on the Dashboard) to use [CoverAttack] this turn.
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 3 [Laceration] on the target (max 3)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 10 [BloodArmor] (max 3)
[DefeatDuel] Consume 4 [BloodArmor] to gain 20 Shield HP
levelList.name: Don Quixote Hardblood Arts 11 - Impaling
